eu.wauz.wauzcore.system

Class WauzTeleporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.WauzTeleporter

  • public class WauzTeleporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to handle different types of teleportation of players.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      • WauzTeleporter

        public WauzTeleporter()

    • Method Detail

      • hubTeleportManual

        public static void hubTeleportManual(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Teleports the player to the hub. The player can manually call this method.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.

      • spawnTeleportManual

        public static void spawnTeleportManual(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Teleports the player to the spawn. The player can manually call this method. Not usable when no character is selected. Not usable when mounted.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.

      • enterInstanceTeleportManual

        public static void enterInstanceTeleportManual(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent event)
        Teleports the player to an instance. The player can manually call this method. Only callable by using instance map items. Not usable when mounted. Not usable inside instances.
        Parameters:
        event - The player event.

      • exitInstanceTeleportManual

        public static void exitInstanceTeleportManual(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Teleports the player to out of an instance. The player can manually call this method. Not usable when mounted.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.

      • enterInstanceTeleportSystemDev

        public static boolean enterInstanceTeleportSystemDev(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                     java.lang.String instanceName)
        Teleports the player to a development instance (actually any world). Only callable with system permissions. Always teleports to 0 5 0 coordinates. Not usable when mounted.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.
        instanceName - The world name to teleport to.
        Returns:
        True if successful.

      • enterInstanceTeleportSystem

        public static boolean enterInstanceTeleportSystem(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                  java.lang.String instanceName)
        Teleports the player to a new normal instance. Only callable with system permissions. Not usable when mounted.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.
        instanceName - The world name to teleport to.
        Returns:
        True if successful.

      • playerTeleportManual

        public static void playerTeleportManual(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                        org.bukkit.entity.Player target)
        Teleports the player to another player. The player can manually call this method. Not usable when mounted. Not usable when player is in another gamemode. Not usable when player is in another (non instance) world. Not usable when player is in another guildhall. Not usable when the instance is full. Not usable when died too much in the instance.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.
        target - The target player.

      • commandTeleport

        public static void commandTeleport(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerTeleportEvent event)
        Teleports the player per command. The player can manually call this method. Not usable when mounted. Not usable when in hub. Not usable when location is in another gamemode. Not usable when location is in another (non instance) world.
        Parameters:
        event - The teleport event.

      • hearthstoneTeleport

        public static void hearthstoneTeleport(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Teleports the player to their home. The player can manually call this method. Not usable when no character is selected. Not usable when mounted. Not usable when player has no home.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.

      • waypointTeleport

        public static void waypointTeleport(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                    java.lang.String waypointKey)
        Teleports the player to a waypoint. The player can manually call this method. Not usable when player is in a not MMORPG world. Not usable when mounted. Not usable with invalid waypoint key.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.
        waypointKey - The key of the waypoint.

      • eventTeleport

        public static void eventTeleport(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                 org.bukkit.Location location)
        Teleports the player to an event. The player can manually call this method. Not usable when event already ended. Not usable when player is in another world. Not usable when mounted.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.
        location - The event location.
